languages.text: [Обратиться к Оптикону-22] "Нам лучше продолжить переговоры вдвоем. Этот здоровяк накаляет атмосферу".
[Address Opticon-22] "I think you and I should continue the discussion in private. The big chap is creating friction."
languages.original_text: [Обратиться к Оптикону-22] "Нам лучше продолжить переговоры вдвоем. Этот здоровяк накаляет атмосферу".

traits.locale_text: [Address Opticon-22] "I think you and I should negotiate in private. The big chap is creating friction."
[Address Opticon-22] "I think you and I should negotiate in private. The big chap is creating friction."
[Address Opticon-22] "I think you and I should negotiate in private. The big chap is creating friction."
[Address Opticon-22] "I think you and I should negotiate in private. The big chap is creating friction."
[Address Opticon-22] "I think you and I should continue the discussion in private. The big chap is creating friction."
[Address Opticon-22] "I think you and I should continue the discussion in private. The big chap is creating friction."

languages.text: [オプティコン-22に話しかける]「我々は内々に交渉するべきだと思うが。あの大男が軋轢を起こしてるぞ」
languages.original_text: [Address Opticon-22] "I think you and I should continue the discussion in private. The big chap is creating friction."

traits.locale_text: [オプティコン-22に話しかける]「我々は内々に交渉するべきだと思うが。あの大男が軋轢を起こしてるぞ」

languages.text: [对奥普蒂孔22号开口]“我觉得这件事情我们应该私下谈谈，这个大块头打算寻衅滋事。”
languages.original_text: [Address Opticon-22] "I think you and I should continue the discussion in private. The big chap is creating friction."

traits.locale_text: [对奥普蒂孔22号开口]“我觉得这件事情我们应该私下谈谈，这个大块头打算寻衅滋事。”

languages.text: [Opticon-22 ansprechen] "Ich denke, Ihr und ich sollten das Gespräch unter vier Augen fortführen. Der große Kerl sorgt für Spannungen."
languages.original_text: [Address Opticon-22] "I think you and I should continue the discussion in private. The big chap is creating friction."

traits.locale_text: [Opticon-22 ansprechen] "Ich denke, Ihr und ich sollten unter vier Augen verhandeln. Der große Kerl sorgt für Spannungen."

languages.text: [Vous adresser à Opticon-22] « Vous et moi devrions poursuivre cette discussion en privé. Votre gorille ne fait que semer la discorde. »
languages.original_text: [Address Opticon-22] "I think you and I should continue the discussion in private. The big chap is creating friction."

traits.locale_text: [Vous adresser à Opticon-22] « Vous et moi devrions négocier en privé. Votre gorille ne fait que semer la discorde. »

languages.text: [Dirigirte a Opticon-22] «Creo que usted y yo deberíamos continuar la discusión en privado. El hombretón está causando cierta tensión».
languages.original_text: [Address Opticon-22] "I think you and I should continue the discussion in private. The big chap is creating friction."

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte a Opticon-22] «Creo que usted y yo deberíamos negociar en privado. El hombretón está causando cierta tensión».

languages.text: [Opticon-22'ye hitap et] "Bence ikimiz bu konuşmaya kendi aramızda devam etmeliyiz. Koca arkadaş sıkıntı çıkarıyor."
languages.original_text: [Address Opticon-22] "I think you and I should continue the discussion in private. The big chap is creating friction."

traits.locale_text: [Opticon-22'ye hitap et] "Bence sen ve ben bu konuşmaya kendi aramızda devam etmeliyiz. Koca oğlan sıkıntı çıkarıyor."
